doc.field: and to answer your last question, am i willing to buy, to really care about global warming and do something extraordinary about it? yes, global warming is an important and significant problem. so, this is a question about saying, let's be smart on global warming, but let's not have it dominate everything else. paul? if you're living in a world in which global warming is dominating everything else, it's a different world than the one i'm living in.
